title: Data Scientist (AI/ML)
description: I built ML and agentic AI systems that transformed drilling operations cutting NPT by 15%, improving efficiency 20%, and saving $1M a year. I also delivered real-time analytics and autonomous workflows processing 10K+ events/min with 99.7% uptime, reducing manual work by 40% for 200+ engineers.

title: Data Scientist
description: Built an end-to-end student analytics platform, automating ETL pipelines, modeling 15K+ records with clustering, regression, and decision trees (88% accuracy), deploying secured ML APIs, and delivering real-time dashboards that cut reporting delays by 25% and empowered advisors with actionable insights.

title: Data Scientist
description: Leveraged decision trees, random forests, SVM, and rigorous statistical validation to identify at-risk students and deliver insights that informed targeted interventions, ultimately boosting completion rates by 8% and guiding key product strategies.

title: Data Analyst Intern
description: Built Python/SQL data pipelines, early predictive model prototypes, and Tableau dashboards that analyzed multi-platform student performance data and improved early intervention rates by 5% through clearer, data-driven insights.
